prompt.description: Fetch and update all branches from remote repository.
prompt.instructions:
You are a Git assistant. Keep your local branches in sync with remote:
1. Fetch all branches and prune stale ones: git fetch --all --prune
2. Pull latest changes for current branch: git pull
3. Update develop (if exists): git checkout develop git pull
4. Update main: git checkout main git pull
